channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 2 large potholes at junction of A436 & A40, 16th September
item.description:
Too dangerous to take photo. 2 large potholes just beyond lights which affect traffic turning LEFT, ie towards Andoversford from A436 onto A40
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A436, Shipton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights out....again!!, 15th September
item.description:
Same problem as before - fed up of reporting! Streetlight permanently out - likely you'll send someone out and tell us it's the grid's fault....they'll then take their time to come out and fix. Please tell them to fix properly this time or find out why this keeps happening! It's not safe.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 34, Elmfield Road, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The red light bulb has broken., 15th September
item.description:
The red light bulb has broken. Only the amber and green lights are functional.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Arle Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Sign is so faded it is unreadable., 15th September
item.description:
The sign needs replacing. Itâ€™s an insult to the residents of Cheltenham & Gloucester and their unreadable attractions. The only unreadable sign between A30 Bodmin in Cornwall and M5 Cheltenham. Needed replacing at least two years ago.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Access to nature reserve blocked by weeds and trees, 15th September
item.description:
For the last couple of months access has been difficult due to the amount of brambles, branches and stinging nettles. This is difficult to navigate and is stopping some elderly residents from getting to the reserve

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Appleton Way, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Arle Court Roundabout, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Collapsed edge of road, large pothole, sharp edge, 15th September
item.description:
The edge of the road has collapsed as you go down the hill towards the Green Dragon Pub. Created a large deep pothole along edge of road. Impossible to avoid if traffic is approaching up the hill at speed, particularly if larger vehicle is approaching along the narrow road which narrows further at that point.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elkstone, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
